item.description:
Smokestack Urban BBQ is located in the Canal area of Worcester near Kelley Square at 90 Harding Street. I ate here recently and was impressed with the food. In talking to the hostess, I found out that they have live music on Thursday nights and serve 4-6 different types of Bacon - up to 50 lbs of the stuff - for free for those who attend...

Seriously, who doesn't like bacon??? The food is very good!

Well if you are vegetarian, they do have vegetarian friendly items on the menu.

Below is the website to access their menu.
http://www.bbqstack.com/

I hope you'll join me and we can discuss skiing / riding from the past weekend and see what is available to ski or ride for the upcoming weekend.

BTW - They have free parking.

Regards,

Jonathan
item.how_to_find_us: We'll be seated by the bar
item.name: Bacon Happy Hour!
